edu.uml.cs.isense.comm
Class RestAPI

java.lang.Object
  edu.uml.cs.isense.comm.RestAPI

public class RestAPI
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles all the communications with the API provided by the website. Most functions are blocking and supposed to be self caching. Version 2.0

Author:
iSENSE Android-Development Team including Mike Stowell, Nick Ver Voort, Jeremy Poulin, and James Dalphond

          Current connection status of RestAPI.

Field Detail

connection

public java.lang.String connection
Current connection status of RestAPI. 200: valid connection 600: invalid connection NONE: not yet logged in

Method Detail

getInstance

public static RestAPI getInstance()
Gets the one instance of the RestAPI class (instead of recreating a new one every time). Functions as a constructor if the current instance is null.

Returns:
current or new RestAPI

getInstance

public static RestAPI getInstance(ConnectivityManager cm,
                                  Context c)
Get the one instance of the RestAPI class (instead of recreating a new one every time). Functions as a constructor if the current instance is null. Will not overwrite the current instance with the new ConnectivityManager or Context.

Parameters:
cm - ContextManager to be used by RestAPI
c - Context RestAPI will be created to
Returns:
current or new RestAPI

                                      java.lang.String eid,
                                      int sid,
                                      java.lang.String img_name,
                                      java.lang.String img_desc)
Uploads an image in conjunction to a specific session.

Parameters:
image - file to be uploaded
eid - experiment id as a String
sid - session id as an integer
img_name - name of the image
img_desc - description of the image
Returns:
whether or not uploading was successful

getPeople

public java.util.ArrayList<Person> getPeople(int page,
                                             int limit,
                                             java.lang.String action,
                                             java.lang.String query)
Deprecated. Since version 2.0. Use getPeople(int page, int limit, String query) instead.

Gets a list of iSENSE users.

Parameters:
page - page of size limit, offset into the full list of results, default 1
limit - number of results desired, default 10
action - how the results are to be sorted (NO LONGER SUPPORTED)
query - person you are searching for
Returns:
ArrayList of Person objects

getExperiments

public java.util.ArrayList<Experiment> getExperiments(int page,
                                                      int limit,
                                                      java.lang.String query,
                                                      java.lang.String sort)
Returns a list of experiments.

Parameters:
page - page of size limit, offset into the full list of results, default 1
limit - number of results desired, default 10
query - search terms by tags/name of experiment example "water"
sort - what to sort results by - accepts the following: recent, popularity, activity, rating
Returns:
ArrayList of Experiment objects

getAllExperiments

public LoadedExperiment getAllExperiments(int page,
                                          int limit,
                                          java.lang.String query,
                                          java.lang.String sort)
Gets experiments by page as a LoadedExperiment object.

Parameters:
page - page of size limit, offset into the full list of results, default 1
limit - number of results desired, default 10
query - search terms by tags/name of experiment example "water"
sort - what to sort results by - accepts the following: recent, popularity, activity, rating
Returns:
LoadedExperiment object containing Experiment objects

createSession

public int createSession(java.lang.String eid,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String street,
                         java.lang.String city,
                         java.lang.String country)
Creates a session under a given experiment.

Parameters:
eid - experiment id as a String
name - name of the session
description - description of the session
street - street where the session was created
city - city/locality where the session was created
country - country where where the session was created
Returns:
int that equals a new session id if successful, -400 if the experiment is closed, or -1 if failure

putSessionData

public boolean putSessionData(int sid,
                              java.lang.String eid,
                              JSONArray dataJSON)
Puts a JSON array of data in a given experiment's specified session.

Parameters:
sid - session id as an integer
eid - experiment id as a String
dataJSON - JSONArray of data to be uploaded
Returns:
whether or not putSessionData was successful

updateSessionData

public boolean updateSessionData(int sid,
                                 java.lang.String eid,
                                 JSONArray dataJSON)
Puts a JSON array of data in a given experiment's specified session. Method has been updated from original: in String url = ..., changed dataJSON.tostring(); from dataCache.toString();

Parameters:
sid - session id as an integer
eid - experiment id as a String
dataJSON - JSONArray of data to be uploaded
Returns:
whether or not putSessionData was successful

getMyIp

public java.lang.String getMyIp()
Deprecated. Since version 2.0. Will always return status 600 - DO NOT USE. This function was removed in iSENSE API v1.0.

Returns IP as a String.

Returns:
IP address as a String

Returns:

useDev

public void useDev(boolean devSwitch)
Switch between iSENSEdev and iSENSE (default behavior is FALSE).

Parameters:
devSwitch - true if you want to use iSENSEdev, false for iSENSE
